name: Sexy Psychic Power Test at Lewdston University
name_original: Sexy Psychic Power Test at Lewdston University
description:
How far can you get with Professor Robin? Put your psychic powers to the test!
I'm so glad to be releasing my 2nd lewd game on Itch!
This one started out as a simple spoof on ESP tests, but ended up as something a tad different..
^.^;;

You'll need your intuition, wits, a bit of luck, and a lot of magic to solve this one. ^.-

Hope you ace it!
